amendment.description: To prohibit the use of contractors for certain Department of Defense activities and to establish limitations on the transfer of custody of prisoners of the Department of Defense.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3313 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 43. Record Vote Number: 118.

Amendment SA 3313 proposed by Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S6703-6704, S6705-6711; text as modified: CR S6704) To prohibit the use of contractors for certain Department of Defense activities and to establish limitations on the transfer of custody of prisoners of the Department of Defense.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3313 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 43. Record Vote Number: 118.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3313 proposed by Senator Dodd.
